svg.text: Principles, construction, and applications of electrical machines

g.text: " Stator: Stationary part with field poles
Motor: Current in armature creates torque
" Low PF increases current for same power

svg.text: Electrical machines are fundamental to modern society, converting between electrical and mechanical energy with ever-increasing efficiency and intelligence.
Understanding their principles enables effective design, operation, and maintenance in diverse applications from household appliances to industrial systems.
